channel.title: My Elemental Staffs
channel.description:
What do you guys think of my Staffs that replace the Staff of Air, Fire, Water, Earth.. I have never liked the old staffs so yeah the one below is the Air the other staffs look the same but obvs the "orb" inside is a different colour..
[img]http://i1302.photobucket.com/albums/ag127/lukeey-3421/air_zpsde93f761.png[/img]

item.title: My Elemental Staffs
item.dc:creator: @rockh4rd rockh4rd
item.description:
@rockh4rd wrote:

[quote=“amy_webb, post:6, topic:545825”]David is on the right track here, you need some improvements here and there but it isn’t that bad. With the staff try make it curved here and there as it is a branch or the shape of one so it gives it that wood feel (don’t add twigs or a leaf just the shape of the branch).

The rings give it that feel of a magic item because they’re floating or being held up by magic, so there isn’t an issue there. An animation added so the rings move would be great for the item too, but that would probably be a lot more difficult.

The thickness and length of the staff also concerns me a bit, when putting it next to the char model try make the staff their length or a bit shorter then them. After doing that size the ball down to match the staff, kinda looks like a giant lollipop at the moment.

Last but not least, colouring. You really should add some shades to the colours even if it is just a few, it’ll really change how you see something.[/quote]

Thanks amy, ill have a mess about and see what happens haha

Read full topic

item.title: My Elemental Staffs
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

David is on the right track here, you need some improvements here and there but it isn’t that bad. With the staff try make it curved here and there as it is a branch or the shape of one so it gives it that wood feel (don’t add twigs or a leaf just the shape of the branch).

The rings give it that feel of a magic item because they’re floating or being held up by magic, so there isn’t an issue there. An animation added so the rings move would be great for the item too, but that would probably be a lot more difficult.

The thickness and length of the staff also concerns me a bit, when putting it next to the char model try make the staff their length or a bit shorter then them. After doing that size the ball down to match the staff, kinda looks like a giant lollipop at the moment.

Last but not least, colouring. You really should add some shades to the colours even if it is just a few, it’ll really change how you see something.

Read full topic

item.title: My Elemental Staffs
item.dc:creator: @rockh4rd rockh4rd
item.description:
@rockh4rd wrote:

Davidi2:

I don’t know if I would consider them an upgrade from the default staves. You made them look like they are made out of plastic instead of wood, because the shaft is just a cylinder. If you fix that and make the orb look a bit better (what is the purple stuff supposed to be?) then it might be nice.

i dont no what the rings are for just thought something different lol also this is first draft of this model and thanks for the comment

Read full topic

item.title: My Elemental Staffs
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

I don’t know if I would consider them an upgrade from the default staves. You made them look like they are made out of plastic instead of wood, because the shaft is just a cylinder. If you fix that and make the orb look a bit better (what is the purple stuff supposed to be?) then it might be nice.

Read full topic

item.title: My Elemental Staffs
item.dc:creator: @rockh4rd rockh4rd
item.description:
@rockh4rd wrote:

Lil_Smok3r:

They’re certainly an upgrade from the current staffs in RS. They look amazing. Well done man!

Cheers man i have already added these to my client and then sorted them out in game but no picture of them yet haha
